text: EuchomenelliniGiglio-Tos E (1916) Mantidi esotici, generi e specie nuove. Bullettino della Società Entomologica Italiana 47: 35−36. is a recently (2017) restored, southeast Asian tribeSchwarz CJ (2017) Update on Tagalomantis manillensis (Saussure), with description of the female and comments on its systematic placement and life history (Insecta: Mantodea: Deroplatyinae). Stuttgarter Beiträge zur Naturkunde A, Neue Serie 10: 19–39. of praying mantids. It is now placed in the new (2019) family Deroplatyidae,Mantodea Species File: family Angelidae (retrieved 11 August 2018) genera having previously been placed in the Angelidae: which now consists only of neotropical mantids. ==Genera== With the discovery of Phasmomantella,Vermeersch XHC (2018) Phasmomantella gen. nov., a spectacular new genus of praying mantis from southern Central Vietnam (Mantodea, Mantidae, Deroplatyinae, Euchomenellini). European Journal of Taxonomy 442: 1–17. the following are included: * Euchomenella Giglio-Tos, 1916 (Vietnam, Borneo) * Indomenella Roy, 2008 (India) - monotypic I. indica (Ghate & Mukherjee, 2004) * Phasmomantella Vermeersch, 2018 (Vietnam: 2 spp.) * Tagalomantis (Hebard, 1920) (Philippines) == References == Category:Mantodea tribes Category:Insects of Southeast Asia
title: Euchomenellini
